评论详情: I love that the shirt is true to size and it’s such a nice quality feel to it. It isn’t short or long and places that it shouldn’t be if it’s just right. It’s not quite wrinkle free but it’s easy to iron. Nice gift as well.

类型: Color: Blue-pink Plaid-navy HorseSize: 15"-15.5" Neck 34"-35" Sleeve
评论详情: This is a very classy, good looking, slim fit shirt. The shirt is 100% cotton which has a premium look and feel for it. Even though the fabric may be a little rougher than some really high-end shirts, this shirt still feels nice. The shirt fits true to size and is very breathable. There is one thing off about this shirt, though. If I bend my elbow past 90° while wearing this shirt, the shirt pinches my elbow crease. This is a really strange issue that I have never experienced before. As this shirt is 100% cotton, there is no stretch, yet the shirt is just loose enough not to need a stretch, except at the elbow. Overall, this is a high-end classy shirt for a semi-reasonable price, yet has a funny sleeve that can pinch one’s elbow crease.

类型: Color: Blue-pink Plaid-navy HorseSize: 15"-15.5" Neck 34"-35" Sleeve

评论概述: Slim means slim everything, including sleeves
类型: Color: Blue-pink Plaid-navy HorseSize: 16"-16.5" Neck 34"-35" Sleeve
评论详情: I like this shirt, but I cannot wear it. I have a very odd build (wide shoulders, smaller waist, average neck, and big arms) and finding shirts that fit is difficult to begin with. I like slim or athletic fit because regular fit has too much fabric around the torso and I have to tuck all of that material into my waistband and it just too bulky. Slim and athletic fits usually give me the room I need in the shoulders, arms, and neck without the extra torso material. This shirt was a bit different in that the arms were also slim cut, so it just about cut off the circulation to my hands. The shoulder were also a bit tight as well. This just wasn't my fit. If you are going to order, just know this shirt is cut for the tall, skinnier fellows. Overall construction was fine. I would even say the stitching is strong, as I didn't break any seams when trying it on and flexing my arms in it, which really put the construction to the test. I like the shirt, but I will have to try another cut, either regular or athletic next time. Four stars for fit and finish. The mistake in overall fit was mine, not the brand.

类型: Color: Blue-pink Plaid-navy HorseSize: 16"-16.5" Neck 34"-35" Sleeve
评论详情: This shirt has a nice look to it but the fabric has a very slick synthetic feel to it. While it is advertised as a slim fit, most slim fitting shirts I have bought fit fine. There is something about the design of the shirt that gives it a very snug feel. When I tried it on and moved my arms forward it felt like the shirt was about to rip.  The shoulders, sleeves and waist are all fine but the the chest and upper back seem out of proportion. I am not overweight nor am I bulked up from weight lifting.... but the upper torso is just a bad fit. So net net it seems to me poorly designed. To be sure this is not typically an issue. I'm not sure a larger size would help.
